Found three problems in the car before buying. AC, radio and   brakes. They fixed the first two and changed the pads for the front wheels only. We paid the amount in cash doing our best making sure the car has no issues as they said and carfax showed. Got the car from them and took it to a Toyota dealership. They found an engine oil leak which cost us $2600. Called them, they said we can't do anything for you. So, if you want to buy from them do yourself a favor and take the car to a mechanic. If they do not let you, go somewhere else because they do not own their dishonesty.
